text: And when he shall see the place of the leprosy lower than the other flesh, and the hair turned white, he shall declare him unclean, for the plague of leprosy is broken out in the ulcer.

segments.text: And when he shall see the place of the leprosy lower than the other flesh, and the hair turned
white, he shall declare him unclean, for the plague of leprosy is broken out in the ulcer.
